metadata.description: Spells that destroy, remove, or corrupt air, weather, and atmospheric phenomena

spells.name: Silence of the Stifled Sound
spells.description: This spell creates a zone of complete silence by destroying all sound within the target area. No noise of any kind can be heard within the affected space, making it impossible to speak, cast spells with verbal components, or hear approaching danger.

spells.name: Destroy the Gathering Clouds
spells.description: This spell destroys clouds and atmospheric moisture in a large area, creating clear skies. It can prevent rain, dispel fog, and eliminate threatening storm clouds before they can develop into serious weather.

spells.name: Suffocate the Struggling Victim
spells.description: This deadly spell removes all air from around a target's head, preventing breathing. The victim begins suffocating immediately and will fall unconscious in about two minutes unless the concentration is broken or they escape the effect.

spells.name: Still the Ferocious Winds
spells.description: This spell completely eliminates wind in a large area, creating unnaturally still air. It can calm dangerous windstorms, stop sailing ships, or prevent wind-based attacks. The effect creates an eerie, motionless atmosphere.

spells.name: Corrupt the Vital Breath
spells.description: This insidious spell corrupts the air in an area, making it harmful to breathe. Anyone in the affected area must make Stamina stress rolls every hour (Ease Factor 9) or suffer a Light Wound from breathing the tainted air. The corruption is invisible and odorless.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (corrupt air quality), +2 Voice, +2 Sun, +2 Room

spells.name: Destroy the Lightning's Path
spells.description: This spell destroys electrical phenomena, including lightning bolts, static charges, and electrical magical effects. It can neutralize lightning-based attacks, prevent electrical damage, and dispel electrical spells of lower level.

spells.name: Banish the Choking Mist
spells.description: This spell destroys fog, mist, smoke, and similar atmospheric obscurations in a large area. It can clear battlefield smoke, eliminate concealing fog, or remove harmful vapors. The air becomes completely clear and visible.

spells.name: Void of the Endless Hunger
spells.description: This spell creates a small area of complete vacuum, destroying all air within it. The void exerts tremendous suction, pulling objects and air toward it. Anyone caught in the effect takes damage from decompression and cannot breathe.

spells.name: End the Howling Storm
spells.description: This powerful spell can destroy even major weather systems like thunderstorms, hurricanes, or blizzards. The storm simply ceases to exist, leaving calm weather in its wake. This requires tremendous power but can save entire regions from natural disasters.

spells.name: Destroy the Scent Upon the Wind
spells.description: This spell removes all scents and odors from the air in an area. It can eliminate tracking scents, remove evidence of alchemical work, or simply freshen stale air. The effect is immediate and complete.

spells.name: Shatter the Crystalline Air
spells.description: This devastating spell creates a massive shockwave by suddenly destroying air in a concentrated burst. The violent implosion and subsequent explosion of air creates a destructive force that can shatter stone and metal. Everything within voice range takes +20 damage from the concussive blast.
